properties.description: If you don’t have a little one, please feel free to sit in another area of the church. Christ Church is open daily for visitors but is only heated on Sunday mornings for services and on Mondays. In the afternoon from 2-3.30, Chat over a Cuppa takes place. This is a chance to meet others over a (free!) cup of tea/coffee and is open to anyone.
properties.title: Christ Church Eaton

properties.address: St Elizabeth's Cadge Road , Norwich, Norfolk NR5 8DG
properties.description: Open from 02-11-22. Our focus is on supporting the local community and partnering with themWe currently partner with our Community Connectors who will frequently be on site, and Food Bank distribute from St Elizabeth's on Thursdays.
properties.title: Crossroads St Elizabeth's Church

properties.description: You can access most Libraries outside staffed hours with “Open Library” providing extra access to the library, its books and computers. Check if it's currently available at your local library here www.norfolk.gov.uk/openlibrary
properties.title: Earlham Library
